channel.title: Help me with command

item.title: Help me with command
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

if (command.startsWith("test") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("terminate")) { stillgfx(547, absY, absX); // 547 = barrow explode stillgfx(547, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(547, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(547, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(547, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(547, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(547, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(547, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(547, absY-2, absX-2); stillgfx(448, absY, absX); // 448 = meteorite stillgfx(448, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(448, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(448, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(448, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(448, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(448, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(448, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(448, absY-2, absX-2); stillgfx(539, absY, absX); // 539 = ice block stillgfx(539, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(539, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(539, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(539, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(539, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(539, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(539, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(539, absY-2, absX-2); stillgfx(26, absY, absX); // 26 = fire arrows stillgfx(26, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(26, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(26, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(26, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(26, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(26, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(26, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(26, absY-2, absX-2); }

please help me make this command hit like 50-70 on everyone in my area?

i know i posted another command where i asked about the same so please help me here?
